00043 public void advice(){

00049                                   "bar", "cafe", "laundromat", "vet", "doctor", "lawyer", "university" };

00063                   //{2, {restaurant, bar, cafe, gym .. 10 items}}

00166           private static HashMap placesCount(String input) {
00167                   
00168                         int numcount = 0;
00169                         HashMap placeCount = new HashMap();
00170 
00171                     //Puts input string into an array, and split it with " ".
00172                         //this one splits on space -- need some other type of marker between sets
00173                     String[] wordlist = input.split(" ");
00174                  
00175                     // Text out (Header)
00176                     
00177                     // declare Arraylist for words
00178                     ArrayList<String> wordEncounter = new ArrayList<String>();
00179                     ArrayList<Integer> numberEncounter = new ArrayList<Integer>();
00180 
00181                     // Checks number of encounters of words
00182                     for (int i = 0; i < wordlist.length; i++) {
00183                         String word = wordlist[i];
00184 
00185 
00186                         if (wordEncounter.contains(word)) {
00187                             // Checks word encounter - return index of word
00188                             int position = wordEncounter.indexOf(word);
00189                             Integer number = numberEncounter.get(position);
00190                             int number_int = number.intValue();
00191                             number_int++;
00192                             number = new Integer(number_int);
00193                             numberEncounter.set(position, number);
00194 
00195                             // Number of encounters - add 1;
00196                         } else {
00197                             wordEncounter.add(word);
00198                             numberEncounter.add(new Integer(1));
00199                         }
00200 
00201                     }
00202 
00203                     // Text out (the list of words)
00204                     for (int i = 0; i < wordEncounter.size(); i++) {
00205                         numcount = numberEncounter.get(i);
00206                         placeCount.put(wordEncounter.get(i), numcount);
00207                     }
00208                     
00209                     return placeCount;
00210 
00211                     
00212                   }//end placescount method/function

00310           private static HashMap placesRemove(HashMap<Integer, ArrayList<String>> places, ArrayList<String> remove) {
00311 
00312                   Iterator place = count.entrySet().iterator(); 
00313                   while (place.hasNext()) { 
00314                           Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) place.next(); 
00315                           String key = (String)entry.getKey(); 
00316                           Integer fqval = (Integer)entry.getValue();
00317                           
00318                           //loop through all elements in remove in order to match with elements in places
00319                           for (String s : remove){
00320                                   if(key.equals(s)){
00321                                           place.remove();
00322                                   }//end if 
00323                                   
00324                           }//end remove for each
00325                          
00326                   }//end while
00327                   Log.d("advices", "Pruned itemset is " + count.toString());
00328                   
00329                   //giving advice section
00330                   
00331                   //a lot of people that go here, also go there
00332 /*put advice about the places that correlate. The user can enter one place and find other places
00333  * that he or she may be interested in going because they are related
00334  * for instance (gym, restaurant) is a frequent pair
00335  * user types in advice.. go to gym and restaurant today!
00336  * or user types in gym and is advised to go the restaurant
00337  * or even better, user types in restaurant and is advised to go the gym
00338  * if user type in restaurant button, advice button will turn red or green
00339  * user can press on it and it tells user other areas to visit like gym or laundromat
00340  * may list near locations
00341  */
00342            giveadvice(count.toString());
00343                   
00344                   return null;
00345           }//places remove end

00347           public static int randInt(int min, int max) {
00348 
00349                     // Usually this can be a field rather than a method variable
00350                     Random rand = new Random();
00351 
00352                     // nextInt is normally exclusive of the top value,
00353                     // so add 1 to make it inclusive
00354                     int randomNum = rand.nextInt((max - min) + 1) + min;
00355 
00356                     return randomNum;
00357                 }

00361           public static ArrayList<String> addonitems(){
00362                   //this needs to recombine to make sets of two 
00363                   //then sets of three etc.
00364                   
00365                   //for every entry in count, iterate through the list adding the next item
00366                   ArrayList<String> newlist = new ArrayList<String>();
00367                 //for every entry in count, iterate through the list adding the next item
00368                   ArrayList<String> newlistappend = new ArrayList<String>();
00369                  
00370                   //create a string list from the count hashmap
00371                   Iterator place = count.entrySet().iterator(); 
00372                   while (place.hasNext()) { 
00373                           Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) place.next(); 
00374                           String key = (String)entry.getKey(); 
00375                           Integer fqval = (Integer)entry.getValue();
00376                           newlist.add(key);
00377                   }//end while
00378                   
00379                   //loop through all elements in remove in order to match with elements in places
00380                   for (String s : newlist){
00381                           
00382                           for (String ss : newlist){
00383                                   
00384                                 if(ss.equals(s)){
00385                                    //do nothing
00386                                         
00387                                 }else
00388                                 {
00389                                         ss = "(" + s +  ", " + ss + ")";
00390                                         newlistappend.add(ss);
00391                                 }//end else
00392                                   
00393                           }//end remove for each
00394                           
00395                   }//end remove for each
00396                   
00397                   //add every other item on the list to each item in the newlist
00398                   
00399                   return newlistappend;
00400                          
00401         }//end

00486                  input[0] = input[0].replace("(", "");
00487                  
00488                  pl = input[0].split(",");
00489                  
00490                  for(int z = 0; z < pl.length; z++){
00491 
00492                  }//end for
00493                  }catch(Exception e){
00494                          Log.d("Exception", e.toString());
00495                          
00496                  }
00497

00499                  return pl;

00503          private static void giveadvice(String list){
00504                  Log.d("advices","Entered advices function" );
00505                  
00506                  String pls[] = null;
00507                  String pllist = list;
00508                  // pllist = list.replace("(", "");
00509                  //pllist = pllist.replace(")", "");
00510                  pllist = pllist.replace("{", "");
00511                  pllist = pllist.replace("}", "");
00512                  pllist = pllist.replace("=", " popularity points: ");
00513                  pllist = pllist.concat("---");
00514                  
00515                  pls = pllist.split("---");
00516                  
00517                  
00518                  //user input
00519                  String input = "restaurant";
00520                  StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
00521                  text.append("Other popular areas include: ") ;
00522                  if( contains( list, input ) ) {
00523                          // Log.d("advices",  "Found " + input + " within " + list + "." );
00524                           
00525                           for(int u = 0; u < pls.length; u++){
00526                                   
00527                         
00528                           
00529                           
00530                           text.append( pls[u].toString()+ " \n");
00531                           text.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00532                           
00533                           }//end for 
00534                           
00535                           balloon.setText(text);
00536                         }
00537                  
00538                  
00539                  
00540          }//end giveadvice method
00541          
00542          private static boolean contains( String haystack, String needle ) {
00543                   haystack = haystack == null ? "" : haystack;
00544                   needle = needle == null ? "" : needle;
00545 
00546                   // Works, but is not the best.
00547                   //return haystack.toLowerCase().indexOf( needle.toLowerCase() ) > -1
00548 
00549                   return haystack.toLowerCase().contains( needle.toLowerCase() );
00550                 }
